txt.en: 'If we are to recover anything from the homestead, we must move quickly. A group of Dragon-clan raiders just passed by here. They must have copied down some of the items from the ledger before you recovered all of the pages.\n\n'This homestead is all my family has. I beg you to help me save it.'
'I thank you for all of your help. I do not know who those men were, but it is clear that they knew my father and were friends. I am very glad for that.'
'If I could, I would do this myself. Please, help me save our land!'
Andras is not the only one who wishes to obtain valuables from his homestead.
Aid Mabon in searching the homestead
Mabon is just east of the homestead in the northern Starkmoor.\n\nMabon needs your help to drive the raiders out of his father's homestead and protect the valuables within.
Talk to Mabon at Andras' homestead
Mabon is just east of the Homestead in the northern Starkmoor.\n\nMabon will want to speak with you about the raid.
